title: US Natural Gas Hits Record Weekly Gain Ahead of Arctic Blast
description: US natural gas futures for February delivery surged by 70% this week as the market braced for a historic winter storm that’s poised to send temperatures plummeting and boost demand for the heating fuel.
content: US natural gas futures for February delivery surged by 70% this week as the market braced for a historic winter storm that’s poised to send temperatures plummeting and boost demand for the heating fuel.
